Description: Uncovered a JSON Web Token, which may lead to unauthorized access to web applications and sensitive user data.
Author: talyssonoliver
Message:
Initial commit: IntelliFlow CRM foundation

Sprint 0 Foundation - Clean codebase with honest status tracking

## What's Included:
- Turborepo monorepo structure (apps/, packages/)
- Next.js web app (apps/web)
- tRPC API server (apps/api)
- AI Worker with LangChain (apps/ai-worker)
- Project Tracker dashboard (apps/project-tracker)
- DDD domain package with Lead aggregate
- Zod validators package
- Prisma database package with schema
- Observability package (OpenTelemetry)
- CI/CD workflows (.github/workflows/)
- Docker configuration
- Development tooling (ESLint, Prettier, Husky)
